attributes.action: Stop the papers from giving false weather headlines
attributes.background: Day after day the papers are worring the elderly and others with weather headlines that are false just to sell papers this has to stop and now.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an editorial decision for newspapers to make.

You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
